428:1: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvaḥ saṃcoditaḥ san tena devaputreṇa rājñaḥ śuddhodanasyemaṃ svapnamupadarśayati sma-yadrājā śuddhodanaḥ suptaḥ svapnāntaragato'drākṣīt bodhisattvaṃ rātrau praśāntāyāmabhiniṣkramantaṃ devagaṇaparivṛtam|
428:3: sa pratibuddhaḥ tvaritaṃ tvaritaṃ kāñcukīyaṃ paripṛcchati sma-kaccit kumāro'ntaḥpure'sti ?
428:5: tato rājñaḥ śuddhodanasyāntaḥpure śokaśalyo hṛdaye'nupraviṣṭo'bhūt-abhiniṣkramiṣyati avaśyaṃ kumāro'yam|
428:10: tato rājñā śuddhodanena kumārasya paribhogārthaṃ trayo yathartukāḥ prāsādāḥ kāritā abhūvan graiṣmiko vārṣiko haimantikaśca|
428:14: ekaikasya ca prāsādasya sopānāni pañca pañca puruṣaśatānyutkṣipanti sma,
428:16: teṣāṃ tathotkṣipyamāṇānāṃ nikṣipyamāṇānāṃ ca śabdo'rdhayojane śrūyate sma-mā khalu kumāro'nabhijñāta evābhiniṣkramiṣyatīti|
428:18: tato rājā maṅgaladvārasya mahānti kapāṭāni kārayati sma|
428:19: ekaikaṃ ca kapāṭaṃ pañca pañca puruṣaśatānyuddhāṭayanti sma,
428:24: atha bhikṣavo bodhisattvaḥ sārathiṃ prāha-śīghraṃ sārathe rathaṃ yojaya|
428:26: tataḥ sārathī rājānaṃ śuddhoddhanamupasaṃkramyaivamāha-deva kumāra udyānabhūmimabhiniryāsyatīti||
428:27: atha rājñaḥ śuddhodanasyaitadabhavat-na kadācinmayā kumāra udyānabhūmimabhiniṣkramitaḥ|
428:32: tato rājā śuddhodanaḥ snehabahumānābhyāṃ bodhisattvasya nagare ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇāṃ kārayati sma saptame divase kumāra udyānabhūmiṃ niṣkramiṣyatīti (subhūmidarśanāya)|
428:33: tatra bhavadbhiḥ sarvāmanāpāni cāpanayitavyāni-mā kumāraḥ pratikūlaṃ paśyet|
428:35: tataḥ saptame divase sarvaṃ nagaramalaṃkṛtamabhūt udyānabhūmimupaśobhitaṃ nānāraṅgadūṣyavitānīkṛtaṃ chatradhvajapatākāsamalaṃkṛtam|
428:37: sa mārgaḥ siktaḥ saṃmṛṣṭo gandhodakapariṣikto muktakusumāvakīrṇo nānāgandhaghaṭikānirdhūpitaḥ pūrṇakumbhopaśobhitaḥ kadalīvṛkṣocchrito nānāvicitrapaṭavitānavitato ratnakiṅkiṇījālahārārdhahārābhipralambito'bhūt|
428:39: atha śuddhāvāsakāyikā devā nidhyāpayanti sma bodhisattvamāharitum,
428:40: tatra bodhisattvasya pūrveṇa nagaradvāreṇodyānabhūmimabhiniṣkrāmato mahatā vyūhena atha bodhisattvasyānubhāvena śuddhavāsakāyikairdevaputraistasmin mārge puruṣo jīrṇo vṛddho mahallako dhamanīsaṃtatagātraḥ khaṇḍadanto valīnicitakāyaḥ palitakeśaḥ kubjo gopānasīvakro vibhagno daṇḍaparāyaṇa āturo gatayauvanaḥ kharakharāvasaktakaṇṭhaḥ prāgbhāreṇa kāyena daṇḍamavaṣṭabhya pravepayamānaḥ sarvāṅgapratyaṅgaiḥ purato mārgasyopadarśito'bhūt||
428:60: jarayā amukta na hi anya gatirjanasya||4||
428:66: atha bodhisattvaḥ pratinirvatya rathavaraṃ punarapi puraṃ prāviśat ||
428:67: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvo'pareṇa kālasamayena dakṣiṇena nagaradvāreṇodyānabhūmimabhiniṣkraman mahatā vyūhena so'drākṣīnmārge puruṣaṃ vyādhispṛṣṭaṃ dagdhodarābhibhūtaṃ durbalakāyaṃ svake mūtrapurīṣe nimagnamatrāṇamapratiśaraṇaṃ kṛcchreṇocchvasantaṃ praśvasantam|
428:74: eṣo hi deva puruṣo paramaṃ gilāno
428:83: atha khalu bhikṣavo bodhisattvaḥ pratinivartya rathavaraṃ punarapi puravaraṃ prāvikṣat||
428:84: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvo'pareṇa kālasamayena paścimena nagaradvāreṇodyānabhūmimabhiniṣkraman mahatā vyūhena so'drākṣīt puruṣaṃ mṛtaṃ kālagataṃ mañce samāropitaṃ cailavitānīkṛtaṃ jñātisaṃghaparivṛtaṃ sarvai rudadbhiḥ krandadbhiḥ paridevamānaiḥ prakīrṇakeśaiḥ pāṃśvavakīrṇaśirobhirurāṃsi tāḍayadbhirutkrośadbhiḥ pṛṣṭhato'nugacchadbhiḥ|
428:91: eṣo hi deva puruṣo mṛtu jambudvīpe
428:95: paralokaprāptu na hi drakṣyati bhūyu jñātīṃ||10||
428:101: yadi jara na bhaveyā naiva vyādhirna mṛtyuḥ
428:105: atha khalu bhikṣavo bodhisattvaḥ pratinivartya taṃ rathavaraṃ punarapi puraṃ prāvikṣat||
428:106: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvasyāpareṇa kālasamayenottareṇa nagaradvāreṇodyānabhūmimabhiniṣkrāmatastaireva devaputrairbodhisattvasyānubhāvenaiva tasminmārge bhikṣurabhinirmito'bhūt|
428:107: adrākṣīdbodhisattvastaṃ bhikṣuṃ śāntaṃ dāntaṃ saṃyataṃ brahmacāriṇamavikṣiptacakṣuṣaṃ yugamātraprekṣiṇaṃ prāsādikenairyāpathena saṃpannaṃ prāsādikenābhikramapratikrameṇa saṃpannaṃ prāsādikenāvalokitavyavalokitena prāsādikena samiñjitaprasāritena prāsādikena saṃghāṭīpātracīvaradhāraṇena mārge sthitam|
428:112: pātraṃ gṛhītva na ca uddhatu unnato vā||13||
428:114: eṣo hi deva puruṣo iti bhikṣunāmā
428:123: atha khalu bhikṣavo bodhisattvaḥ pratinivartya taṃ rathavaraṃ punarapi puravaraṃ prāvikṣat||
428:124: iti hi bhikṣavo rājā śuddhodano bodhisattvasyemāmevaṃrūpāṃ saṃcodanāṃ dṛṣṭvā śrutvā ca bhūyasyā mātrayā bodhisattvasya parirakṣaṇārthaṃ prākārān māpayate sma,
428:131: caturṣu nagaradvāraśṛṅgāṭakeṣu caturo mahāsenāvyūhān sthāpayati sma bodhisattvasya parirakṣaṇārtham|
428:132: ya enaṃ rātriṃdivaṃ rakṣanti sma-mā bodhisattvo'bhiniṣkramiṣyatīti|
428:133: antaḥpure cājñāṃ dadāti sma-mā sma kadācitsaṃgītiṃ vicchetsyatha|
428:143: nirghoṣaśca balasya tasya mahataḥ śabdo mahā śrūyate|
428:144: nagaraṃ vyākulu bhītatrastamanaso mā smād vrajetsūrato
428:145: mā bhūcchākyakuloditasya gamane chidyeta vaṃśo hyayam||17||
428:146: ājñapto yuvatījanaśca satataṃ saṃgīti mā chetsyathā
428:148: ye vā istriyamāya nekavividhā darśetha ceṣṭāṃ bahuṃ
428:149: ārakṣāṃ prakarotha vighna kuruthā mā khu vrajetsūrataḥ||18||
428:150: tasyā niṣkramikāli sārathivare pūrve nimittā ime
428:151: haṃsā kroñca mayūra sārika śukā no te ravaṃ muñciṣu|
428:154: puḍinīpuṣkariṇīṣu padma rucirā mlānāni mlāyanti ca
428:155: vṛkṣāḥ śuṣkapalāśa puṣparahitāḥ puṣpanti bhūyo na ca|
428:157: bherīścaiva mṛdaṅga pāṇyabhihatā bhidyanti no vādyiṣu||20||
428:158: sarvaṃ vyākulamāsi tacca nagaraṃ nidrābhibhūtaṃ bhṛśaṃ
428:159: no nṛtte na ca gāyite na ramite bhūyo manaḥ kasyacit|
428:161: hā dhikśākyakulasya ṛddhi vipulā mā haiva saṃdhakṣyate||21||
428:162: ekasmiṃ śayane sthite sthitamabhūdgopā tathā pārthivo
428:165: vṛkṣā mārutaeritā kṣiti patī utpāṭya mūloddhṛtāḥ||22||
428:167: keśānadṛśi lūna dakṣiṇi bhuje mukuṭaṃ ca vidhvaṃsitam|
428:168: hastau chinna tathaiva chinna caraṇau nagnā dṛśī ātmanaṃ
428:169: muktāhāra tathaiva mekhalamaṇī chinnā dṛśī ātmanaḥ||23||
428:170: śayanasyā dṛśi chinna pāda caturo dharaṇītalesmiṃ chayī
428:171: chatre daṇḍu sucitru śrīma ruciraṃ chinnā dṛśī pārthive|
428:172: sarve ābharaṇā vikīrṇa patitā muhyanti te vāriṇā
428:179: dṛṣṭvā sā pratibuddha ruṇṇanayanā svaṃ svāminaṃ abravīt|
428:180: devā kiṃ mi bhaviṣyate khalu bhaṇā supināntarāṇīdṛśā
428:181: bhrāntā me smṛti no ca paśyami punaḥ śokārditaṃ me manaḥ||26||
428:183: gopāmālapate bhava pramuditā pāpaṃ na te vidyate|
428:184: ye sattvā kṛtapuṇyapūrvacaritā teṣeti svapnā ime
428:230: harṣaṃ vindā mā ca khedaṃ janehi
428:246: kṛṣṇā śubhā caturi prāṇaka pāda lekhī
428:252: so nāva kṛtva prataritva parāṃ pratārya
428:256: so vaidya bhūtva bahu oṣadha saṃprayacchā
